name: Organic Beeswax Candle - Cupcake
description:
Organic Beeswax Candle - Cupcake 170G



Delivery within 2~3 working days after receiving clear payment.


Beeswax candles use 100% Australian organic beeswax which contain no additives, no paraffin and no petro-chemicals. 

A beeswax candle is also said to be a natural ioniser when it is burning, purifying your air of dust, pollen, odours, toxins, mould and mildew whilst leaving a light, natural honey scent.

We use environmentally friendly square braid cotton wicks. 
We are proud that our product is made from quality Australian beeswax free of drugs, pesticides and chemicals.

To produce one pound of beeswax, a worker bee eats about 10 pounds of honey, flies 240,000 kilometres and visit 33 million flower blossoms! Australian beeswax is reported (by industry sources) to command premium prices on the world market because of its freedom from adulteration and chemical residues.

+ Inspring 


This pretty, sophisticated candle inspired by movie 'Amelie'.

This scent may reminds you beautiful memories of Paris.

Think about sitting in small cafeteria in Montmartre.
Listening accordion's romantic sound. 
and drink Fresh citrus Juice with your love.

+ Short Story about the movie 


 Amelie (2001) 

"Le fabuleux destin d'Amélie Poulain" (original title)


Amelie, an innocent and naive girl in Paris, with her own sense of justice, decides to help those around her and along the way, discovers love.

___________________________________________________


Merci!

La paix soit avec vous!

___________________________________________________

+ Inspiring 


This Sweet and angelic candle inspired by movie 'Ricky'.

If you like baby's lovely sweet scent, Pick me!


___________________________________________________


+ Short story about movie 

Ricky (2009)

Katie, a single mother living in France with her daughter Lisa, 
struggles to make ends meet while working at a chemical factory.
 
There, she meets Paco, a co-worker from Spain. 
Soon, they move in together, and Katie becomes pregnant. 

Katie gives birth to a baby boy, named Ricky, and she and Paco raise him together in their tiny apartment, along with Lisa. However, it soon becomes apparent that Ricky is no ordinary baby; 

he develops a pair of functioning wings and becomes able to fly. 

Soon he is flitting about in their tiny apartment, and together Katie and Paco struggle to raise and handle the ever-growing Ricky.


http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1189076/?ref_=fn_al_tt_1

___________________________________________________



Merci!

La paix soit avec vous!

name: ORGANIC ROSEHIP OIL
description:
ORGANIC ROSEHIP OIL

Pure, Cold Pressed Rosehip Oil 

25ml


Use in skin healing salves and creams to accelerate 
healing and tissue regeneration. 

High in Vitamin A, Rosehip Oil is very useful for very Dry, 
and Damaged Skin, Sunburn, Age Spots, 
Wrinkles and in Eye Creams. 

Rosehip is non-greasy, absorbed quickly, 
and is safe to apply directly even on sensitive skins.

name: Bamboo Charcoal soap with Lavender oil
description:
Oily skin and detox

60g

Soap base:

All 100% pure soap made with only the finest natural vegetable oils. No detergents, no surfactants. No sulfates, no alcohol! 


Bamboo Charcoal activated :

Natural, black colourant. Our activated charcoal comes from bamboo wood (a renewable resource). 

Our charcoal soap is strong detoxifying facial bar. 
It draws impurities and toxins out of the skin, helping to solve troubled skin problems.


Lavender essential oil :

Lavender is renowned for its calming and balancing effects on the mind and body. 

Actions: Anti bacterial, analgesic, antiseptic, antispasmodic, deodorising, and more

name: Virgin olive oil and oilve leaf soap with basil oil
description:
Complex skin, sensitive skin, awakening


60g


Soap base :

Our Soap Base contains 20% Virgin Olive Oil. The lather is creamy and generous. Offers great moisturising and emollience.

Our Olive soap uses a "natural" formula containing added Glycerine, and with the primary oil being Virgin Olive. This base is 100% pure soap made with only the finest natural vegetable oils. No detergents, no surfactants. No sulfates, no alcohol! 

Olive leaf powder :

Its astringent and antiseptic properties, bringing peace to your skin. 


Basil oil :

Basil Essential Oil is a crisp, herbaceous, slightly camphorous smelling oil often used to add a crisp sharp note or in insect repelling blends. 

Useful for: focus & concentration (so avoid at night), energising, muscle aches, repelling insects

Actions: Expectorant, anti-bacterial, antiseptic, calmative

name: Goat milk and honey soap with Lemon oil
description:
Moisturising and antivacterial


60g


Soap base:

Our Goats Milk Soap is as smooth as silk - luscious and creamy. Goats milk has wonderful skin softening and nourishing qualities. Our Goats Milk Soap is made with 10% refrigerated Real, Fresh, Liquid Goatsmilk - the kind we drink! Our Goats Milk Soap has a delicate and creamy lather 

Honey :

Honey moisturizes and soothe your skin as it is lenitive, and also prevents bacteri evolution.

Lemon oil (cold pressed) :

May be Useful for Colds, chilblains, dull skin, flu, oily skin, varicose veins, warts.

name: Australian White Clay Oatmeal Soap - with Ylang Ylang and Rose
description:
Dry skin , moisturising, calming

60g

Soap base:

This soap contains finely ground Oatmeal, for exfoliation, and offers a great moisturising lather.

Our  Oatmeal Soap Logs use a "natural" formula containing 20% added Glycerine, and mainly Coconut Oil. This soap is 100% pure soap made with only the finest natural vegetable oils. No detergents, no surfactants. No sulfates, no alcohol! 

Aussie white clay :

The mildest of the Clays, along with our cream coloured Kaolin, Pure White Clay is not particularly drawing, which makes it suitable for dry skin. Suitable for all skin types this Pure White Aussie Clay is Calming, Cooling and Softens the skin. Mined in Queensland, this clay is ideal for sensitive and irritated skin, dull complexions and sufferers of Rosacea.


Peaceful essential oil blend:

Grounding and peaceful, this blend could equally be named “Confidence”. 
Pure Essential Oil Blend of: Rosewood, English Lavender, Valencia Orange, West Australian Sandalwood, Lemon, Ylang Ylang 


한국에서 주문해주시는 분들 정말 감사합니다.

배송비 절감차원에서
일주일간 주문을 받은 후 배송이 됨으로 

일주일에서 최대 2주일까지 
배송기간이 걸릴 수 있습니다.

이점 양해부탁드립니다.

감사합니다.
